summaries:
The document is an annual report for Oracle Corporation for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2025, filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The company is incorporated in Delaware and has its principal executive offices in Austin, Texas. The trading symbols for Oracle's Common Stock are ORCL on the New York Stock Exchange.

The report indicates that Oracle Corporation is a large accelerated filer, has filed all required reports during the preceding 12 months, and has submitted all Interactive Data Files required by Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the same period. The company's internal control over financial reporting has been assessed as effective under Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act.

As of May 31, 2025, the aggregate market value of Oracle Corporation's voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000. The number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, is 2,808,833,000.

Portions of Oracle Corporation's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders are incorporated by reference into the Annual Report on Form 10-K. The full proxy statement will be filed with the SEC within 120 days of Oracle’s fiscal year ended May 31, 2025.

No specific product information, discoveries, IP, or operational processes are mentioned in the document chunk provided.
